title: Scars Are Beautiful
content:
Scars Are Beautiful
[伤疤即美]
Cracks, like scars, tell a story. They are not only beautiful to look at, they are also lessons in survival and perseverance.
[裂痕如同伤疤，诉说着故事。它们不仅美得动人，更是生存与坚持的教科书。]
There is no learning, no victory, no good story without a share of failures, scars, and the perseverance it took to overcome them. Too often we overlook that idea in our perception of beauty.
[没有失败、伤痕与克服它们的坚持，就不会有成长、胜利或动人的故事。可我们总在定义美时，遗忘这一点。]

There is no learning, no victory, no good story without a share of failures, scars, and the perseverance it took to overcome them.
Too often we overlook that idea in our perception of beauty.
[没有失败、伤痕与克服它们的坚持，就不会有成长、胜利或动人的故事。可我们总在定义美时，遗忘这一点。]
